name: MultiForm
description:
A Platformer Were You Can Change Colour To Get Through Places You Cant Go As The Opposite Colour.

Sorry For The Music Its My First Try At Making My Own SoundTrack.

Made For The Minimalist Game Jam #1. 

And Thanks To The Tools I Use : 

Godot

BFXR

Pixelorama

Modulator

LMMS

I Loved The Jam As It Was A Challenge And I Loved Learning Lots. :D
